casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samuel Lee GASKINS. No. 398P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Samuel L. Gaskins, Vanceboro, for Gaskins, Samuel Lee. Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of November 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
